channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21320] get_fields() and get_tables_by_type() are not protected by HMS server access control
item.description: User without any privilege can call these functions and get all meta data back as if user has full access privilege.
item.summary: get_fields() and get_tables_by_type() are not protected by HMS server access control

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
